mapper.update:
update out_of_contract_compensation_statistics
project_id = #{projectId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
subcontractor_id = #{subcontractorId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
labor_account_id = #{laborAccountId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
report_time = #{reportTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
quarter = #{quarter,jdbcType=TINYINT},
total_amount_contract = #{totalAmountContract,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
mechanical_class = #{mechanicalClass,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
sporadic_employment = #{sporadicEmployment,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
daily_work_subtotal = #{dailyWorkSubtotal,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
out_in = #{outIn,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
disaster_damage = #{disasterDamage,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
work_stop = #{workStop,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
other = #{other,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
compensation_subtotal = #{compensationSubtotal,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
total = #{total,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
daily_percentage = #{dailyPercentage,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
compensation_percentage = #{compensationPercentage,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
amount_already_disbursed = #{amountAlreadyDisbursed,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
disbursed_percentage = #{disbursedPercentage,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
examination = #{examination,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
settlement = #{settlement,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
estimate_mechanical_class = #{estimateMechanicalClass,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
estimate_sporadic_employment = #{estimateSporadicEmployment,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
estimate_daily_work_subtotal = #{estimateDailyWorkSubtotal,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
estimate_out_in = #{estimateOutIn,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
estimate_disaster_damage = #{estimateDisasterDamage,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
estimate_work_stop = #{estimateWorkStop,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
estimate_other = #{estimateOther,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
estimate_compensation_subtotal = #{estimateCompensationSubtotal,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
create_user = #{createUser,jdbcType=BIGINT},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_user = #{updateUser,jdbcType=BIGINT},
estimate_total = #{estimateTotal},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update out_of_contract_compensation_statistics set project_id = #{projectId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, subcontractor_id = #{subcontractorId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, labor_account_id = #{laborAccountId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, report_time = #{reportTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, quarter = #{quarter,jdbcType=TINYINT}, total_amount_contract = #{totalAmountContract,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, mechanical_class = #{mechanicalClass,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, sporadic_employment = #{sporadicEmployment,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, daily_work_subtotal = #{dailyWorkSubtotal,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, out_in = #{outIn,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, disaster_damage = #{disasterDamage,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, work_stop = #{workStop,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, other = #{other,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, compensation_subtotal = #{compensationSubtotal,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, total = #{total,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, daily_percentage = #{dailyPercentage,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, compensation_percentage = #{compensationPercentage,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, amount_already_disbursed = #{amountAlreadyDisbursed,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, disbursed_percentage = #{disbursedPercentage,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, examination = #{examination,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, settlement = #{settlement,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, estimate_mechanical_class = #{estimateMechanicalClass,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, estimate_sporadic_employment = #{estimateSporadicEmployment,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, estimate_daily_work_subtotal = #{estimateDailyWorkSubtotal,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, estimate_out_in = #{estimateOutIn,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, estimate_disaster_damage = #{estimateDisasterDamage,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, estimate_work_stop = #{estimateWorkStop,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, estimate_other = #{estimateOther,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, estimate_compensation_subtotal = #{estimateCompensationSubtotal,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, create_user = #{createUser,jdbcType=BIGINT}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_user = #{updateUser,jdbcType=BIGINT}, estimate_total = #{estimateTotal} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: SELECT o.*, p.`name` AS projectName, pi.project_type AS projectType, pi.contract_number AS contractNumber, s.`name` AS subcontractorName, la.team_name AS teamName, la.contract_person AS contractPerson FROM out_of_contract_compensation_statistics o LEFT JOIN project_info pi ON o.project_id = pi.project_id LEFT JOIN subcontractor s ON o.subcontractor_id = s.id LEFT JOIN labor_account la ON o.labor_account_id = la.id LEFT JOIN project p ON o.project_id = p.id WHERE o.id = #{id}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM (SELECT o.id FROM out_of_contract_compensation_statistics o LEFT JOIN project_info pi ON o.project_id = pi.project_id LEFT JOIN project p ON o.project_id = p.id WHERE 1=1
AND o.project_id = #{projectId}
AND p.`name` LIKE concat('%',#{projectName},'%')
group by o.project_id) AS a

SELECT SUM(ic.valuation_price) FROM out_of_contract_compensation_statistics o LEFT JOIN inspection_account ic ON o.project_id = ic.project_id AND o.subcontractor_id = ic.subcontractor_id AND ic.labor_account_id = o.labor_account_id where o.project_id = #{projectId} group by o.project_id;
